title: nloc
description: A negative or positive offset from Mean Sea Level (6,371.0088km from Earths core).

ndef.description: The node with location in geospace and time.

ndef:form.description: The form of node referenced by the ndef.

latlong.description: The latitude/longitude the node was observed.

time.description: The time the node was observed at location.

place.description: The place corresponding to the latlong property.

loc.description: The geo-political location string for the node.
